Synopsis
class Functor w => ComonadCoideal w where
coidealize :: w a -> w (a, w a)
type Coideal = Ap (,)
coideal :: (a, f a) -> Coideal f a
buildCoideal :: Coalgebra m a -> a -> Coideal m a
newtype Mutual p m n a = Mutual {
runMutual :: m (p a (Mutual p n m a))
}
type :* m n = Mutual' (,) m n
